text: Hi everyone, new here, I got this task to check SEO performance and I keep running in to same recommendations that I need to "Increase word count" even though the articles are more than 300 words, any ideas? thanks :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello all.

I have a page speed issue with render blocking by the froms/v2.js file is killing me. The site is built on the HubSpot CMS and using standard landing pages with forms.

Do you know of any solutions for defering the form js or some other page speed improvement solution with regards to page speed on mobile when a HubSpot form is included?
